overview: A divorced socialite decides to join the Army because she hopes it will enable her to see more of her boyfriend, a Colonel. She soon encounters many difficulties with the Army lifestyle. Moreover, her ex-husband is working as a consultant with the Army, and he uses his position to disrupt her romantic plans by making her join a group of WACs who are testing new equipment.
tagline: Roz, that "Wonderful Town" Gal, and Marie - on a laugh-loaded spree!
title: Never Wave at a WAC
